allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add tick exposure tracking and enhance vaccine scheduling

- Add env_tick_exposure field to Dog model for tick-endemic area tracking
- Add DocumentExtractNewDogView API endpoint for extracting dog info from 
  documents without requiring an existing dog \(supports new dog creation flow\)
- Update vaccine_rules.json with detailed descriptions, rename DAP to DHPP,
  and add min_start_age_weeks for all vaccines
- Enhance scheduler to enforce AAHA/WSAVA guideline: final DHPP dose must be
  after 16 weeks to ensure maternal antibodies have waned
- Include vaccine descriptions in schedule notes for better user education

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add guest mode and enhance schedule UI with calendar export

Guest Mode:
- Allow unauthenticated users to create one dog and view vaccine schedule
- Add useGuestStore \(Zustand\) for local guest dog and vaccination storage
- Create GuestScheduleView, GuestScheduleItem, GuestVaccinationList components
- Implement client-side guestScheduler.js for offline schedule calculation
- Update routing to make Dashboard public, protect dog detail appropriately
- Add guest banners prompting signup for full features

UI Enhancements:
- Redesign DogForm with floating labels, progress indicator, and hero header
- Add env_tick_exposure option with automatic Lyme vaccine recommendation
- Add individual vaccine calendar export \(ICS for Apple, Google Calendar URL\)
- Add expandable/collapsible vaccine description notes
- Implement custom scrollbar styling
- Add optimistic UI states for dog cards during creation
- Update header button styles for better visibility on dark background

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
